refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: kadatabase is a tool for managing mysql schema of kadeploy. It use mysql script and the configuration file of kadeploy. You can install kadeploy faster with this tool.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: -addmysqlrights Add your "deploy" user to mysql rights.
-delmysqlrights Remove your "deploy" user from mysql rights.

refentry.refsect1: CONFIGURATION FILE /etc/kadeploy/deploy_cmd.conf must be correctly written. The mysql user (login/password/dbname) will be created from this file.

refsect1.title: EXAMPLE
refsect1.para: kadatabase -addmysqlrights -create_db_deploy -patch21 -patch211 Install all the required schema.
